meanings.definition: A protein containing a heme group.
meanings.sent1: The hemeprotein in our blood helps carry oxygen to all parts of our body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hemeproteins to understand how they function in living organisms.
meanings.sent3: The hemeprotein in the superhero's suit gave him the power to breathe underwater.
meanings.sent4: Her love for adventure was like a hemeprotein, always carrying her to new and exciting places.
meanings.sent5: The deep red color of the hemeprotein under the microscope was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A type of protein that contains iron and is involved in oxygen transport.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in hemeproteins can help maintain healthy oxygen levels in the body.
meanings.sent2: Hemeproteins play a crucial role in ensuring oxygen reaches our muscles during exercise.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's treasure chest was filled with precious hemeproteins instead of gold coins.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, hemeproteins flowed through the streets like life-giving streams.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's performance improved after increasing intake of hemeproteins in her diet.
